seees man coomon

1. only download serial
2. go to www.grisoft.com/doc/31/ww/crp/0  (go  down of the page)
3. copy and past serial intro: License Number Lookup
4. download AVG 7.5 INTERNET SECURITY from AVG server (fast + no need to seed !)
5. go to Control Center (AVG), Update Manager click Settings, click URL, dubble click Update.grisoft.cz, Delete URL and type: http://backup.grisoft.com/softw/70/update
